name: Main Course Sampler
notes: You must complete one star in each of the regular courses.

name: Water, Water Everywhere
notes: You must complete one star in each of the water courses.

name: Slip 'n' Slide to Success
notes: You must complete every star that requires using a slide.

name: One Hundred Coins For A Star
notes: You must complete at least one coin star.

name: Six Hundred Coins For Six Stars Spread Across The Castle
notes: You must complete all coin stars.

name: Say Hello To Your Little, and Big, Friends
Blast Off
notes: Complete all stars requiring a cannon.

name: Who Bullies the Bullies?
notes: Beat all the bullies for their stars.

name: On Top of the World
notes: Find the stars at the highest points.

name: Make Bowser See Red
notes: Get the red coin stars in Bowser's levels

name: Puzzling Mysteries of the Mushroom Kingdom
notes: Get all of the stars that require solving a puzzle.

name: Fly, Discorporate, and Steel
notes: Get all stars requiring the use of a cap.

name: Fire 'n' Ice
notes: Complete the fire and snow courses.

name: Smiling, Slippery, Sneaky Secret Stars
notes: Get all of the secret castle stars.

name: Big Bad Boss Baddies
notes: Beat up all the big baddies.
